affiliation_name: Shanghai Development Centre at Singapore Telecommunications Ltd
overview:
Senior Software Engineer

More than 10 years of experience on software development and support. Expert in Unix/Linux environment, especially HPUX and Ubuntu Linux. Expert in Web applications run on open source web servers: Apache, Nginx and Tomcat. Have good command of numerous programming languages, especially Ruby on Rails, Perl, Shell script, Unix C and Java. Familiar with Oracle and Mysql database; fluent in SQL and PL/SQL scripting; obtained Oracle Certified Profession certification. Have basic knowledge on Cisco and H3C switches and routers.

degrees.subject: Computer Science and Technology
degrees.institution: University of Electronic Science and Technology of China
